name: prestashop
description: PrestaShop is a self-hosted e-commerce platform offering a feature-rich online store with support for custom themes, inventory, payments, and extensions. It is widely used for scalable, customizable e-commerce sites.
features: Product management: Create and manage unlimited products with variants, attributes, and custom options.
Order processing: Handle orders with customizable workflows, status tracking, and automated notifications.
Payment gateways: Accept payments through multiple gateways including PayPal, Stripe, and credit cards.
Shipping integration: Connect with major carriers for real-time rates, label printing, and tracking.
Theme customization: Personalize store appearance with responsive themes and visual customization tools.
Multi-language support: Sell globally with built-in translation tools and multi-currency capabilities.
Inventory management: Track stock levels, set low-stock alerts, and manage warehouse locations.
Customer accounts: Enable customer registration with order history, wishlists, and saved addresses.
Marketing tools: Run promotions, discounts, and loyalty programs to increase sales and retention.
SEO optimization: Improve search rankings with friendly URLs, meta tags, and sitemap generation.
Analytics dashboard: Monitor sales, traffic, and customer behavior with built-in reporting tools.
Module marketplace: Extend functionality with thousands of free and paid modules from the community.
